Config.Name: App URL
Config.Description: The URL where you will access the app. Recommended to change from default.

Config.Name: Behind Proxy
Config.Description: Whether the app is behind a reverse proxy.

Config.Name: Maxmind License Key
Config.Description: License Key for the GeoLite2 Database. If the key is not provided, IP locations will be marked as unknown in audit logs.

Config.Name: Disable UI Configuration
Config.Description: Disable the ability to configure the app via the UI. If enabled, you must set all required environment variables. See documentation: https://pocket-id.org/docs/configuration/environment-variables/#overriding-the-ui-configuration

Config.Name: Database - Connection String
Config.Description: The connection string for the database. If using SQLite, this should be left as is.

Config.Name: Upload Path
Config.Description: Path inside the container where uploaded files are stored

Config.Name: Keys Path
Config.Description: Path inside the container where keys are stored

Config.Name: GeoLite2 Database Path
Config.Description: Path to the GeoLite2 database file.

Config.Name: GeoLite2 Download Link
Config.Description: The URL to download the GeoLite2 database.

Config.Name: Internal Port
Config.Description: The port inside the container on which the server should listen. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Internal Host
Config.Description: The host inside the container on which the server should listen. Not recommended to change.
